title: Egan Bernal sets his First Target for 2024: ‘I Want to Win the Tour of Colombia’
content:
Nearly two years after his horrific crash, could things finally be looking up for the Colombian superstar? 'It's what I work for every day.'

Read the full article at Egan Bernal sets his First Target for 2024: ‘I Want to Win the Tour of Colombia’ on Velo.
author: ahood
